snippet: Minnesota’s first Museums Month will begin in May, an event that’s expected to become an annual celebration of cultural institutions.
abstract: Minnesota will host its first Museums Month in May 2012, a statewide month-long celebration of cultural institutions that many museum administrators expect to become an annual event.
lead_paragraph: Minnesota’s first Museums Month will begin in May, an event that’s expected to become an annual celebration of cultural institutions.

headline.seo: Minnesota Starts Museums Month in May
headline.main: Set Aside a Day for Museums? Minnesota Thinks Bigger
headline.print_headline: Set Aside a Day for Museums? Minnesota Thinks Bigger
